title: Ivanti nZTA - Analytics Logs
description: This dashboard provides visibility into system activity through Admin Logs, Access Logs, and Event Logs.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides visibility into system activity through Admin Logs, Access Logs, and Event Logs. It helps track administrative actions, user access patterns, and security events, enabling efficient auditing, compliance, and threat detection within the nZTA environment.

For more information, see the [Ivanti nZTA Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/ivanti_nzta).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

search.query: source:ivanti-nzta service:(admin-logs OR access-logs OR event-logs) $Severity $User-Name $Gateway-Name
source:ivanti-nzta service:(admin-logs OR access-logs OR event-logs) $Severity $User-Name $Gateway-Name
source:ivanti-nzta service:(admin-logs OR access-logs OR event-logs) @severity:CRITICAL $Severity $User-Name $Gateway-Name

source:ivanti-nzta service:(admin-logs OR access-logs OR event-logs) @severity:MINOR $Severity $User-Name $Gateway-Name
source:ivanti-nzta service:(admin-logs OR access-logs OR event-logs) @severity:INFO $Severity $User-Name $Gateway-Name
source:ivanti-nzta service:(admin-logs OR access-logs OR event-logs) $Severity $User-Name $Gateway-Name

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Ivanti nZTA logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
